invariants.description: Ensures that participants provide the exact required amount to enter the lottery.
The jackpot (pot) is always non-negative, preventing underflow errors.
The bank address is initialized to a non-zero address upon contract deployment.
Ensures the random variable is always binary (0 or 1), keeping a 50% chance distribution as intended.
Ensures that the jackpot resets to 0 after a win is distributed, avoiding accidental reuse of funds.
Ensures there are sufficient funds in the pot to deduct the fee before payout, avoiding negative balances.
